means: 事先形成的观点或思想

sentence.Network_en: He proceeds to take apart every preconception anyone might have ever had about him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他继续逐一剖析人们对他可能怀有的成见。

sentence.Network_en: It was another case of the preconception fathering the prediction.
sentence.Network_cn: 这可以说又是按先入之见做出预言的一例.

sentence.Network_en: Clara was full of a sombre preconception.
sentence.Network_cn: 克拉拉心中充满了模糊的成见.

entry.tran: 事先形成的看法；先入之见；成见
entry.def: Your preconceptions about something are beliefs formed about it before you have enough information or experience.

example.ex: Did you have any preconceptions about the sort of people who did computing?...
example.tran: 你对从事计算机工作的人有什么成见吗？

example.ex: He did not allow his preconceptions to compromise his scientific work.
example.tran: 他不允许自己的先入之见破坏自己的科学工作。

means.word_mean: 1. an opinion formed beforehand without adequate evidence;

sentences.sentence: "he did not even try to confirm his preconceptions"

means.word_mean: 2. a partiality that prevents objective consideration of an issue or situation

auth_sentence.content: This is not, of course, a new preconception.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not, of course, a new preconception.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not, of course, a new preconception.

auth_sentence.content: But Eurisko didn't have that kind of preconception, partly because it didn't know enough about the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Eurisko didn't have that kind of preconception, partly because it didn't know enough about the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Eurisko didn't have that kind of preconception, partly because it didn't know enough about the world.

means.word_mean: 事先形成的观点或思想;偏见

sentences.en: her preconceptions of life in the country
sentences.cn: 她对在乡下生活的先入之见

sentences.en: I had no preconceptions about what to expect.
sentences.cn: 我对期望什么,没有先人之见。

sentences.en: It is important to challenge society’s preconceptions about disabled people.
sentences.cn: 质疑社会对残疾人的成见极为重要。

sentences.en: There's no longer the preconception that men cannot arrange flowers.
sentences.cn: 认为男人不能插花的偏见已经不复存在了。
